name: runtools
short_description:
this project consists of several sub-projects:

irun - run program (including batch files) invisibly
eg, the following would make login.bat run invisibly
# c:\> irun login.bat

setupexe - run specified setup with administrator 
privilege 
eg, specify in "setup.ini" the following to launch installer:
# [setup]
# run=msiexec /i installer.msi

inirun - similar to setupexe, except that administrator privilege is not requested and command line parameters are also passed to the specified program. eg, specify in "inirun.ini" the following:
# [inirun]
# run=notepad.bat
then inirun.exe will call notepad.bat as if it were inirun - inirun.exe can be renamed to something else so it can do a workaround for an executable as a quick fix for operational probloms.
summary: tools to launch programs under win32
